      • Database

        public Database()

    • Method Detail

      • databaseExist

        public static boolean databaseExist()
        Returns:
        Boolean based on whether or not the database exists on the system, and if it can write to it. If there is an error, the application will terminate.

      • createDatabase

        public static void createDatabase()
        Attempts to create the database if it does not already exist on the system.

      • writeToDatabase

        public static void writeToDatabase(java.lang.String data)
                            throws DatabaseError
        Writes data to the database. It should be noted that this function will overwrite existing data. It does not append to the file.
        Parameters:
        data - - The data that is going to be written to the file.
        Throws:
        DatabaseError - Either Unable to write, invalid operating system, or issue closing writer.

      • retrieveFromDatabase

        public static java.lang.String retrieveFromDatabase()
        Reads and returns the contents of the database.
        Returns:
        The data from the database.

      • addSong

        public static void addSong(java.lang.String path,
                           application.UI.Genre.genre genre,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String artist)
        Adds a song to the database.
        Parameters:
        path - - The file path of the song.
        genre - - The genre.
        title - - The title.
        artist - - The artist.

      • isInDatabase

        public static boolean isInDatabase(java.lang.String path)
        Returns if the provided path is in the database.
        Parameters:
        path - - The path of the song.
        Returns:
        Boolean based on whether or not the path is in the database.

      • getArtist

        public static java.lang.String getArtist(java.lang.String path)
        Gets the artist of a specific file from the database.
        Parameters:
        path - - Path of the file that is in the database.
        Returns:
        The artist.

      • getTitle

        public static java.lang.String getTitle(java.lang.String path)
        Gets the title of a specific file from the database.
        Parameters:
        path - - Path of the file that is in the database.
        Returns:
        The title.

      • getGenre

        public static java.lang.String getGenre(java.lang.String path)
        Gets the genre of a specific file from the database.
        Parameters:
        path - - Path of the file that is in the database.
        Returns:
        The genre.

      • editArtist

        public static void editArtist(java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String newArtist)
        Overrides and edits the artist in the database.
        Parameters:
        path - - Path of the file that is in the database.
        newArtist - The new artist name.

      • editTitle

        public static void editTitle(java.lang.String path,
                             java.lang.String newTitle)
        Overrides and edits the title in the database.
        Parameters:

        newTitle - The new title name.
